column4: Hi, just upgraded my laptop from Gutsy to Hardy, and now I can't log into Gnome. Only some letters (like 5 and +) works at all when entering the username and password
Sorry, no the keylock is not on. Login works great in the non-gnome terminals
Google and the Ubuntu bug database finds me nothing
i had a similar problem a while ago, turned out to be a prob with language and keyboard layout configs, maybe check those
